credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Page from a sketchbook showing St. Luke.
medium: Pen ink.  ("A" with bistre wash).  Paper.  Red color stamp: eagle displayed in circle
description: Vertical rectangle.  The Apostle stands before a niche, thinking about what he will write next.  The Bull crouches behind him.  The left lower part of the coat shows the correction of a first design.  Verso:  "B," horizontally.  The bull runs towards left.  The putto flies beside him, holding his head.  Caption:  "A and scribbling/ a fare col vise fra le corne e con lemane sula fronte che/ il toro vede lume corendo."  Notes vertically, on top: "adi 18 dicembre bighest et fatken van/ 2 trellen tetrinken/ La di 14 di gennaio comencai a/ bere la bottade 4 borili e 1/2."
name: Drawing
